20110116013135.000|20110116013136.000|CC1|GIFFORDS' THROAT.               
20110116013136.000|20110116013138.000|CC1|SHE WAS GIVEN A TRACHEOTOMY, A  
20110116013138.000|20110116013140.000|CC1|TUBE IN HER WIND PIPE AND       
20110116013140.000|20110116013141.000|CC1|FEEDING TUBE.

20110116013142.000|20110116013144.000|CC1|PROCEDURE FOR PATIENTS WITH     
20110116013144.000|20110116013146.000|CC1|SEVERE BRAIN INJURIES AND THAT  
20110116013146.000|20110116013148.000|CC1|HER TREATMENT IS PROCEEDING AS

20110116013211.000|20110116013213.000|CC1|FIRST TIME SINCE THE SHOOTINGS,

20110116013528.000|20110116013528.000|CC1|AIRPORT.

20110116013534.000|20110116013536.000|CC1|OF TUNISIAN IMMIGRANTS MARCHED
